title: Ep. 62 "WAGS Atlanta" ft. Kierra Douglas, Ariel Anderson & Hope Wiseman
description:
Reality stars Hope Wiseman, Kierra Douglas and Ariel Anderson from E!’s new show WAGS Atlanta. The show airs January 3rd and we got the ladies to spill a little bit of tea. We talked about dating athletes, cleat chasers, pro-hoes,and so much more. We also learned about what really goes into making a reality show, the pros and cons of having your life aired on tv and the negative effects it can have on your relationships.

Follow our guests:
Ariel Anderson @arielashleyy
Kierra Douglas @misskierraa
Hope Wiseman @iamhopesodope
